CustomField.description: This is new Dispatch From Field (Created for automation on the basis of Invoice Number)
CustomField.formula: IF( LEFT(Invoice_Number__c ,3 )= 'AV1', "Silvassa Factory", IF( LEFT(Invoice_Number__c ,3 )= 'AV2' ,"Aurangabad(MH) Warehouse", IF( LEFT(Invoice_Number__c ,3 )= 'AV3' ,"Sri Ganganagar(RJ) Warehouse", IF( LEFT(Invoice_Number__c ,3 )= 'AV4' ,"Nashik(MH) Warehouse", IF( LEFT(Invoice_Number__c ,3 )= 'AV5' ,"Pune(MH) Warehouse", NULL)))))
CustomField.label: Dispatch From
